colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGO NAS GRIB SEL BYA TSUL NOR BU KE TA KA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DON GNYER PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BAR BRTEN, MKHA' 'GRO'I SGRUB THABS DANG 'BREL BA'I GRIB SEL GYI GDAMS PA RNAMS RTA MGRIN LA MI 'GRIGS BZHIN DU NAN GYIS SBYOR BAR DGOS PA MA MCHIS SHING, SNGAR BKOD PA'I GDAMS PA 'DI NYID YI DAM GANG LA'ANG SBYAR CHOG PAR, RTA MGRIN GYI LE LAG TU BLANG BAR 'GAL BA MED PAR BSAM NAS BTZUN GZUGS ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS, DHA TA'I PA'I CHAR SGAR THOG TU SBYAR BA'O, ,TSUL 'DI DGE SLONG THABS MKHAS RGYA MTSO DANG, ,DAD LDAN BLO BZANG THOGS MED RNAM GNYIS KYI, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR DE LUNG ZIN CHOS SDE CHE, BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING DU DPAR DU 'KHOD, ,'DIS MTSON DGE BAS TSE RABS THAMS CAD DU, ,THEG MCHOG DAM PA'I MGON DANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, ,MTHA' YAS RGYAL BA'I CHOS TSUL KUN GZUNG NAS, ,BLA MED LAM PHYI RIM PA THAR PHYIN SHOG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
